DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of a single intravenous dose of PG110, a monoclonal antibody that inhibits the effects of the naturally occurring substance, nerve growth factor (NGF).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of PG110 in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis Pain
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe pain attributed to knee osteoarthritis Significant comorbidity Significant pain states other than osteoarthritis Concomitant medications that might affect assessments
